channel.title: Scaffold Type :: Choria Configuration Manager
channel.description: This document describes the design of the scaffold resource type for rendering template directories into target directories. Overview The scaffold resource renders files from a source template directory to a target directory: Rendering: Process templates using Go text/template or Jet engine Synchronization: Detect changed, stable, and purgeable files Cleanup: Optionally remove files in the target not present in the source Templates have access to facts and data from Hiera, enabling dynamic configuration generation from directory structures.

item.title: Choria Provider
item.description: This document describes the implementation details of the Choria scaffold provider for rendering template directories using the choria-io/scaffold library. Provider Selection The Choria provider is the default and only scaffold provider. It is always available and returns priority 1 for all scaffold resources.
